Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
@ The program stripped from the JOB_PARAMETER, which used as single parameter
for submitserver jobs, the differnent possible parameters. At the moment
the sum of possible parameters, which could be used to submit a serverjob,
is limited up to 30 parameters, where the first parameter included the sum
of parameters, which will be used to call the diff. programs
-- DO NOT MOVE THE SEQUENCE OF THE PARAMETERS, the subtask uses the
-- function VARSET to fill the output paramters
-- Working fields
-- ':::' will be used as separator between the diff. parameters in the parameter
-- string
@ The sum of possible input parameters which could be used for program calls via
submitserver job is limited to 30 input parameters, where the first input
parameter included the sum of parameters
(f.e. the content of the hole input string is
means
'4' = Sum of parameters
'1' = 1. Parameter
'308' = 2. Parameter
'98' = 3. Parameter
'3' = 4. Parameter
The content of ("sum of parameters" + 1) will be used as endtask condition
current task (+1, because the 1. parameter is not included in the sum of
parameters)
-- Get next position of separator in parameter string
-- Fill ouptput parameter 1 -30
-- Delete stripped content of out parameter
